title: My summoner name won't update and neither will my level on here, so i can only post to one board?
body: The title... I'm now "A Very Sad Clown" and my level and name has not updated at all so I cannot post to any other boards. {{champion:14}}. Whenever I click on "Create a Discussion" it says posting as my old name"

replies.body: Everything seems to be okay now!  Just gotta give it a moment for your account to sync to the boards.
Thank you! Looks like tis working now :)
